thursday: Khan Academy Command of Evidence videos and exercises
friday: Practice correcting sentence structure and clarity
saturday: Full length practice test #1 under timed conditions
Use College Board official practice test: https://collegereadiness.collegeboard.org/sat/practice/full-length-practice-tests
sunday: Rest and light review of errors from practice test

monday: Words in context & vocabulary in reading
tuesday: Standard English conventions practice in writing
wednesday: Math advanced topics: functions and geometry
Khan Academy Geometry and functions practice
thursday: Mixed reading and writing practice sets
Focus on pacing and time management
friday: Math problem solving and data analysis
saturday: Full length practice test #2 under timed conditions

wednesday: Writing: expression of ideas and improving paragraphs
thursday: Math mixed problem solving and timed drills
friday: Reading and Writing mixed sections timed practice
sunday: Rest and light review of exam mistakes

monday: Review all math mistakes and re-practice concepts
tuesday: Review reading and writing weak points
wednesday: Full timed reading and writing practice
Use College Board official daily practice online
thursday: One last full length timed practice test
friday: Positive mindset and test day prep
sunday: Rest day, prepare materials for test day

practice_test_schedule: Week 1 - Saturday: Full length practice test #1
Week 2 - Saturday: Full length practice test #2
Week 3 - Saturday: Full length practice test #3
Week 4 - Thursday: Final full length practice test
